mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_audit_log( id, tenant_id, trace_id, action_type, actor_user_id, actor_role, target_type, target_id, before_json, after_json, chain_seq, hash_prev, hash_curr, hash_algo, created_at ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{tenantId}, #{traceId}, #{actionType}, #{actorUserId}, #{actorRole}, #{targetType}, #{targetRef}, #{beforeJson, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{afterJson, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chainSeq}, #{hashPrev, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hashCurr, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hashAlgo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdAt} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, tenant_id, trace_id, action_type, actor_user_id, actor_role, target_type, target_id, CAST(before_json AS VARCHAR) AS before_json, CAST(after_json AS VARCHAR) AS after_json, chain_seq, hash_prev, hash_curr, hash_algo, created_at FROM tb_audit_log WHERE id = #{auditId}
SELECT tenant_id, last_seq, last_hash FROM tb_audit_chain_state WHERE tenant_id = #{tenantId} FOR UPDATE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_audit_chain_state( tenant_id, last_seq, last_hash, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{tenantId}, #{lastSeq}, #{lastHash}, #{updatedAt} )

INSERT INTO tb_audit_export_log( id, tenant_id, requested_by, export_format, from_utc, to_utc, row_count, trace_id, created_at ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{tenantId}, #{requestedBy}, #{format}, #{fromUtc}, #{toUtc}, #{rowCount}, #{traceId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
